chunks.title: What is NYLAGo? Core Capabilities
chunks.body: NYLA is a smart AI that executes blockchain transactions on X.com social platform. NYLA is the AI agent that performs the actual transactions. NYLAGo is a separate interface tool - NYLAGo helps users create commands that NYLA can execute. The relationship: NYLAGo generates commands → Users post commands → NYLA executes transactions. Core capabilities: 1) Generate transfer commands for sending tokens within Solana, Ethereum, or Algorand blockchains (no cross-chain transfers). 2) Create swap commands for trading tokens within the same blockchain only. 3) Generate QR codes for receiving payments on each supported blockchain. 4) Execute blockchain transactions when users post or reply with generated commands on X.com social platform. 5) Facilitate community engagement through social features separate from blockchain operations.
chunks.summary_en: NYLA is the AI agent that executes blockchain transactions. NYLAGo is the interface that generates commands for NYLA. Supports Solana, Ethereum, or Algorand blockchains (no cross-chain).
chunks.summary_zh: NYLA是执行区块链交易的AI代理。NYLAGo是为NYLA生成命令的界面。支持Solana、Ethereum或Algorand区块链（无跨链）。

chunks.title: What can NYLAGo do?
chunks.body: NYLAGo can: 1) Generate transfer commands for sending tokens to usernames (no wallet addresses needed) within Solana, Ethereum, or Algorand blockchains. 2) Create swap commands for trading tokens within the same blockchain only (Solana-to-Solana, Ethereum-to-Ethereum, Algorand-to-Algorand). 3) Generate QR codes for receiving payments on any supported blockchain. 4) Create X.com social platform posts with transaction commands that NYLA executes when posted. 5) Provide community engagement tools like raid lists and social features. 6) Support multiple blockchains while maintaining simplicity through X.com social platform integration.
chunks.summary_en: NYLAGo generates commands for transfers, same-blockchain swaps, QR payments, and X.com social platform posting. Supports 3 blockchains with social integration and community features.
chunks.summary_zh: NYLAGo生成转账、同区块链交换、QR支付和X.com社交平台发布的命令。支持3个区块链，具有社交集成和社区功能。
